whoweare.title: LEXOFT is much more than a provider: it's a dedicated partner for the success of your projects.
whoweare.description:
Your trusted technical partner

I am Alexandre Bessard, founder and CEO of LEXOFT.

Specialized in Java, Spring, TypeScript, Angular, Kubernetes, Terraform, AWS, and artificial intelligence, I design powerful, scalable, and fully customized software solutions.

I hold recognized technical certifications (AWS, Oracle, HashiCorp, Kubernetes, Spring...), ensuring a high level of expertise and reliability.

LEXOFT is a legally registered French company compliant with regulations, enabling transparent, simple, and professional collaboration.

My top priority: your satisfaction.
Each project is carried out with attentiveness, rigor, and commitment to meet your exact needs.

Looking to develop a Java application, modernize an interface, migrate to the AWS cloud, or strengthen your online presence?
LEXOFT brings your ideas to life with expertise, passion, and dedication.
certification.main.title: Certifications
certification.main.title2: Technical certifications: a mark of quality and reliability
certification.main.description:
I am certified by industry leaders such as AWS, Oracle, VMware, HashiCorp, and the Linux Foundation.

These certifications validate my advanced skills in software development, cloud computing, infrastructure as code, cybersecurity, DevOps, and artificial intelligence.

For you, the client, it is the guarantee of working with a qualified professional, up to date with industry best practices, and capable of delivering robust, secure, and sustainable solutions.
ourvalues.title: A guarantee of credibility and trust
ourvalues.technical.title: Technical Excellence
ourvalues.technical.description: At LEXOFT, we are committed to delivering software solutions of exceptional quality. With deep technical expertise in Java, Angular, AWS cloud, Kubernetes, Terraform... we continuously strive for excellence. This ongoing pursuit allows us to design products and services that exceed our clients’ expectations.
ourvalues.collaboration.title: Provigis Certificate
ourvalues.collaboration.description:
We, Provigis SAS, acting as a trusted third party, hereby certify that:

The company LEXOFT (SIREN: 984607226), headquartered at 6 ALLÉE DE LA CHAVANNERIE, 45240 LA FERTE ST AUBIN, France, has received the Bronze Responsible Third Party Medal under the Provigis medal program.

The Bronze Responsible Third Party Medal certifies that the company LEXOFT has compliant legal documentation (Kbis and URSSAF).
ourvalues.innovation.title: Agile Innovation
ourvalues.innovation.description: At LEXOFT, we embrace agile innovation in an ever-evolving technological environment. By staying constantly informed about new trends, best practices, and emerging technologies, we remain at the forefront. This agility allows us to design flexible and tailored solutions, providing our clients with a unique competitive edge in their sector.
header.title: Bring your ideas to life with tailor-made software solutions
expertise.title: My expertise
expertise.description: Expertise in software development and AWS cloud
expertise.language: Power and Versatility with Java and Spring
expertise.ui: Advanced User Experience with Angular and TypeScript
expertise.scalability: Elasticity and Scalability on AWS with Kubernetes and Terraform
expertise.optimisation: Lifecycle Optimization with a DevOps Approach
expertise.realisation.title: Keys to building innovative software
expertise.realisation.programming.title: Advanced Expertise in Java and Angular Development
expertise.realisation.programming.descri: We have solid experience in development with Java and Angular, demonstrating our ability to design robust and high-performance solutions using these modern development technologies.
expertise.realisation.cloud.title: Mastery of AWS Cloud Services
expertise.realisation.cloud.description: Our expertise covers the design, deployment, and management of applications on AWS. We highlight our skills in cloud infrastructure provisioning, use of services such as EC2, S3, and RDS, as well as our ability to optimize the performance and reliability of applications deployed on AWS.
expertise.realisation.orchestration.titl: Advanced Knowledge of Kubernetes for Container Orchestration
expertise.realisation.orchestration.desc: We excel in the use of Kubernetes for container orchestration, thus contributing to improved agility and availability of your applications.
expertise.realisation.team.description: Our ability to work effectively within multidisciplinary teams is highlighted, with experience collaborating with developers, cloud engineers, system administrators, and other stakeholders to ensure project success.
expertise.realisation.security.title: Commitment to Security and Compliance
expertise.realisation.devops.title: Advanced DevOps Practices for High-Quality Continuous Delivery
expertise.realisation.devops.description: We have the ability to automate development, testing, and deployment processes by implementing effective CI/CD pipelines. We also integrate practices such as infrastructure as code, monitoring, and logging to ensure high-quality continuous delivery.
expertise.realisation.team.title: Collaboration Experience in Multidisciplinary Teams
expertise.realisation.security.descripti: We are committed to security and compliance, with experience implementing best practices in data protection, identity and access management, and adherence to industry standards and regulations.
services.main.title: My services
services.development.description: Design and development of custom business solutions using Java, Python, and Angular, tailored to the specific needs of the company.
services.migration.title: Cloud Applications and AWS Migration
services.migration.description: Support for migrating to the AWS cloud with a focus on reliability, security, and performance. Design of cloud-native applications based on microservices architecture.
services.cloud.native.app.title: Infrastructure as Code (IaC) & DevOps
services.infrastructure.title: Kubernetes Orchestration
services.infrastructure.description: Deployment and management of containerized applications at scale with Kubernetes, ensuring high availability.
services.development.title: Custom application development
services.cloud.native.app.description: Design cloud-optimized applications using microservices-based architectures, Kubernetes, and other cloud technologies.
services.management.containers.title: Container Management with Kubernetes
services.management.containers.descripti: Deploy and manage containerized applications at scale using Kubernetes for container orchestration, ensuring optimal scalability and availability.
services.practice.devops.title: DevOps Practices
services.practice.devops.description: Implement DevOps practices to automate development, testing, and deployment processes, fostering continuous delivery of high-quality software.
services.training.title: Consulting and Training
services.training.description: Provide consulting and training services to help companies optimize their use of Java, Angular, AWS, Kubernetes, Terraform, and DevOps technologies.
services.support.maintenance.title: Support and Maintenance
services.support.maintenance.description: Ensure continuous support and maintenance of developed applications, including monitoring, security patches, and functional updates.

provigis.medal.title: Responsible third party
provigis.medal.description: I provide proof of the compliance of my legal file (Art. D8222-5 of the Labor Code) regarding official company registration documents and regularity of social contributions.
header.description:
Software solutions that reflect your business

Every company has unique needs.

That’s why I offer fully customized software, designed to precisely match your business goals.

With a solid background in development, I turn your digital vision into concrete, innovative and reliable solutions.
team.subtitle: Alexandre, expertise at your service
team.title: Founder & Software Engineer at LEXOFT
team.information:
I help businesses accelerate their digital transformation with robust, custom-made cloud, AI, and fullstack solutions.

An expertise built over more than 7 years on high-value strategic projects.

button.1: What are your specific skills in software development?
button.2: How do you organize your work as a freelancer?
button.3: How do you charge for your freelance services?
button.4: What is your prior experience as a freelancer?
button.5: How do you handle potential technical issues during a project?
button.6: How do you keep your skills up to date?

answer.1: As a freelancer, I specialize in Java, Typescript, Spring Boot, Angular, AWS, Kubernetes, Terraform, Git, Jenkins, Kafka, etc., with proven experience in building high-performance web applications.
answer.2: I follow an agile and structured approach. I adapt to your priorities while ensuring regular communication and clear reporting.
answer.3: I offer flexible pricing: fixed-price or daily rate. Everything is defined up front to avoid surprises.
answer.4: With over 7 years of experience, I’ve worked on high-stakes technical projects for both public and private sector clients.
answer.5: I quickly analyze the source of the issue, communicate resolution options, and apply reliable, documented solutions.
answer.6: I continuously train through AWS, Spring, and Terraform certifications, as well as by staying up to date with the latest technologies and trends.
answer.7: Yes, authentic recommendation letters from previous clients are available upon request. Feel free to contact me to receive one.
